revised_title: On the Adaptation of Sloped Lenses to Telescopes of Unequal Magnifying Power in Perpendicular Directions
tldr: The author investigates the adaptation of sloped lenses to telescopes with unequal magnifying power in perpendicular directions, focusing on the reduction of optical aberration. The study explores the conditions under which aberration can be minimized or eliminated, providing insights into lens design for telescopes.
